Yes you create your config first then assign it to your controller.
Something like this:

SparkMaxConfig config1 = new SparkMaxConfig();
config1.inverted(false);
// Whatever you need to configure...

SparkMax motor1 = new SparkMax(CANID, MotorType.kBrushless);
motor1.configure(config1, ResetMode.kResetSafeParameters, PersistMode.kPersistParameters);
